title: Modern Escape in the Heart of Cardiff & Minutes from Ancient Fortress
description: Nestled between a medieval fort and a contemporary waterfront is the Holiday Inn Cardiff City Centre, an IHG Hotel, perfectly situated in the heart of the Welsh capital. This expanding city showcases ultramodern architecture slotting perfectly alongside historic terrace buildings. The hotel is within walking distance of all the attractions, including Cardiff Castle and the vibrant high street. Or stay in and enjoy modern British fare in the Junction Restaurant or a beer in Callaghan's Sports Bar.
